title: Low Priority Que From A Friend.
body: I have dodged 2 matches in the past like 30 days. But I duo'd with a friend who was in low priority que and after that I suddenly am. It told me she was for dodging to many, so I don't know why I am though. It didn't give me a message or anything like it did for her when I joined hers.

replies.body: I'm not currently seeing any leaverbuster, so it may have indeed been for a dodge.  You can also get a lower priority queue if you keep declining matches as well, or if you are queued with another player who had a lower priority queue.
Also it didnt show when I duod with someone else and im getting in games fast. Might be a glitch.
